hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #an Ocarina#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #an Ocarina#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that invisible ghosts can be exposed with Deku Nuts.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.
